attributes.action: Fix the a249! Southern water should be working day & night to repair this road.
attributes.additional_details: Southern water and local authority should be treating this as an urgent matter that needs immediate rectification. 2 hours to what is usually 20 minutes every day at rush hour then to be told it wont be opening for the immediate future by the kent messenger is unacceptable!
attributes.background: The a249 is the only main road to sittingbourne and sheppey without using smaller roads. When they closed under the sittingbourne exit for repairs everyone has to exit onto the slip road which causes tailbacks as far as the m2. There are no crews working nights or weekends to repair this quickly.

rejection.details:
Thank you for your petition. We are unable to accept your petition in its current form, as the petition title does not call for clear action from the UK Government or Parliament.

A petition which called on the agency responsible (Highways England) to prioritise the repair of the A249 would be likely to be acceptable. We would consider any petition which you resubmit.
